publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5620.1 Ted Brocklebank: The Scottish Newspaper Industryâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-5620) in the name of Pauline McNeill, after second "community" insert "; regrets that almost a year after the Glasgow Caledonian University seminar on 4 February 2009 on the newspaper industry, organised by the Minister for Enterprise, Energy and Tourism and involving newspaper proprietors, journalists, trade unionists and other stakeholders, there appears to have been little further dialogue between the Scottish Government and the sector".
